item.title: BLOOMIOS INC S-1
item.description: BLOOMIOS INC, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC S-1 filing on July 14, 2021 had 27909 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 442 instances stock - 425 instances common - 356 instances shares - 352 instances 000 - 277 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
